Telepatía 100 pies

action->Infused Items.name: Artículos infundidos
action->Infused Items.description: Jafaki lleva estos artículos infundidos: 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Moderate Acid Flasks} , 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.97QyNEOAyYLdGaYc]{Moderate Bottled Lightnings} , 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qpzL9UnTi4cDhy6J]{Moderate Cognitive Mutagens} , 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Lesser Elixirs of Life} , 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ax8XcBd0rRd1Z7hN]{Moderate Mistform Elixirs} y ​​2 dosis de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WL4O32qFifxnMj0H]{Wyvern Poison} (uno de los cuales ya han aplicado a su estoque). Estos artículos duran 24 horas, o hasta la próxima vez que Jafaki haga sus preparativos diarios.

action->+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

action->Command Confusion.name: Confusión de mando
action->Command Confusion.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura falla su salvación contra el aura de niebla mental de Jafaki

Efecto Jafaki determina a quién ataca la criatura @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confuso} durante esa ronda, en lugar de que el objetivo sea determinado aleatoriamente por el DJ.

Si el objetivo elegido es el aliado de la criatura confusa, la criatura puede intentar inmediatamente una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:21]; en caso de éxito, se determina su objetivoaleatoriamente como de costumbre, y con un éxito crítico el objetivo ya no está confundido.

action->Mindfog Aura.name: Aura de niebla mental
action->Mindfog Aura.description:
20 pies. Una criatura que comienza su turno en el aura debe tener éxito en una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:23] o convertirse en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confuso} durante 1 ronda; Si tiene éxito, esa criatura es temporalmente inmune durante 1 minuto.

Jafaki puede suprimir o activar esta aura como una sola acción con el rasgo concentrado.

action->Envenom Weapon.name: Arma venenosa
action->Envenom Weapon.description: Jafaki aplica su veneno seugathi innato a un arma que empuñan.

action->Magic Item Mastery.name: Dominio de objetos mágicos
action->Magic Item Mastery.description: Jafaki puede lanzar un hechizo a partir de objetos mágicos incluso si el hechizo no está en su lista de hechizos. Todos estos hechizos son hechizos ocultos y utilizan la CD del hechizo innato de Jafaki y su modificador de ataque.

action->Quick Consumption.name: Consumo Rápido
action->Quick Consumption.description: Jafaki interactúa para extraer un elixir o mutágeno y luego lo bebe.

action->Seugathi Venom.name: Veneno Seugathi
action->Seugathi Venom.description:
Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24]

Duración máxima 6 rondas

Etapa 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] daño y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 1} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] daño y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecido} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} (1 ronda)

action->Site Bound.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.BcSlVpaN72LoQ5BV]
Vinculado al sitio
action->Site Bound.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.BcSlVpaN72LoQ5BV]

Área C13

Un fantasma típico puede alejarse sólo una corta distancia del lugar donde fue asesinado o del lugar que frecuenta. Un límite típico es de 120 pies. En cambio, algunos fantasmas están vinculados a una habitación, edificio, elemento o criatura que era especial para ellos en lugar de una ubicación.

action->Rejuvenation.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.unR8VVR4yyRnsmnB]
Rejuvenecimiento
action->Rejuvenation.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.unR8VVR4yyRnsmnB]

Quitar las mesas y herramientas de esta habitación le permite a Jarelle pasar al más allá.

Cuando un fantasma es destruido, se vuelve a formar después de [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} dentro de la ubicación a la que está vinculado, completamente curado. Un fantasma puede ser destruido permanentemente sólo si alguien determina la razón de su existencia y corrige todo lo que impide que el espíritu descanse.

action->Malevolent Possession.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.iwLj14liESK5OBN8]
Posesión malévola
action->Malevolent Possession.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.iwLj14liESK5OBN8]

Jarelle intenta poseer una criatura corpórea adyacente. Esto tiene el mismo efecto que el hechizo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} (con una CD del hechizo de 22), excepto que como Jarelle no tiene un cuerpo físico, no se ve afectada por esa restricción del hechizo.

action->Poisoned Breath.name: Aliento envenenado
action->Poisoned Breath.description:
Jarelle exhala una @Template[type:cone|distance:15] de niebla tóxica que causa @Damage[5d6[poison]] daño ( @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|basic:true] salvación; en caso de fallo crítico, el objetivo también es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 24 horas).

Luego no podrá volver a usar Aliento envenenado durante [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Poisoned Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Jaul Mezmin.name: Jaul Mezmín
Jaul Mezmin.blurb: Acosador de hombre lobo humano macho

spell->Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
spell->Lightning Bolt.description:
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

spell->Wall of Thorns.name: Wall of Thorns
spell->Wall of Thorns.description:
Over the course of a minute, you cause a thick wall of thorny brambles to grow from the ground. You create a 5-foot-thick wall of brambles and thorns in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically. If you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall has cover from creatures on the opposite side, and the wall's spaces are difficult terrain. For every move action a creature uses to enter at least one of the wall's spaces, that creature takes 3d4 piercing damage.

Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 20 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section can be moved through freely.

Heightened (+1) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 5, and the piercing damage increases by 1d4.

spell->Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
spell->Water Breathing.description:
The targets can breathe underwater.

Heightened (3rd) The duration increases to 8 hours.

Heightened (4th) The duration increases to until your next daily preparations.

spell->Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
spell->Acid Splash.description:
You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))[persistent,acid]] damage.

Heightened (3rd) The initial damage increases to 2d6, and the persistent damage increases to 2.

Heightened (5th) The initial damage increases to 3d6, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2.

Heightened (7th) The initial damage increases to 4d6, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3.

Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases to 5d6, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Feather Fall.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]
Caída de pluma
spell->Feather Fall.description:
Trigger a creature within range is falling

You cause the air itself to arrest a fall. The target's fall slows to 60 feet per round, and the portion of the fall during the spell's duration doesn't count when calculating falling damage. If the target reaches the ground while the spell is in effect, it takes no damage from the fall. The spell ends as soon as the target lands.

spell->Grease.name: Grease
spell->Grease.description:
You conjure grease, with effects based on choosing area or target.

  • Area [4 contiguous 5-foot squares] All solid ground in the area is covered with grease. Each creature standing on the greasy surface must succeed at a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check against your spell DC or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Creatures using an action to move onto the greasy surface during the spell's duration must attempt either a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check to Balance. A creature that Steps or Crawls doesn't have to attempt a check or save.
  • Target [1 object of Bulk 1 or less] If you cast the spell on an unattended object, anyone trying to pick up the object must succeed at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save against your spell DC to do so. If you target an attended object, the creature that has the object must attempt an Acrobatics check or Reflex save. On a failure, the holder or wielder takes a -2 circumstance penalty to all checks that involve using the object; on a critical failure, the holder or wielder releases the item. The object lands in an adjacent square of the GM's choice. If you cast this spell on a worn object, the wearer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against attempts to grapple them.

spell->Heal.name: Heal
spell->Heal.description:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8

3 (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Heal Animal.name: Heal Animal
spell->Heal Animal.description:
You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target. The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

spell->Magic Fang.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]
colmillo mágico
spell->Magic Fang.description:
Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MqZ6FScbfGtXB8tt]{Spell Effect: Runic Body}

spell->Produce Flame.name: Produce Flame
spell->Produce Flame.description:
A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach.

On a success, you deal 2d4 fire damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

spell->Summon Animal.name: Summon Animal
spell->Summon Animal.description:
You conjure an animal to fight for you. You summon a common creature that has the animal trait and whose level is -1, such as those found in Pathfinder Bestiary volumes. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

Heightened (2nd) Level 1

Heightened (3rd) Level 2

Heightened (4th) Level 3

Heightened (5th) Level 5

Heightened (6th) Level 7

Heightened (7th) Level 9

Heightened (8th) Level 11

Heightened (9th) Level 13

Heightened (10th) Level 15

spell->Tanglefoot.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]
Pie enredado
spell->Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

weapon->Katar.name: Katar
weapon->Katar.description: Also known as punching daggers, katars are characterized by their H-shaped hand grip that allows the blade to jut out from the knuckles.

action->Wolf Empathy.name: Empatía del lobo
action->Wolf Empathy.description: Jaul puede comunicarse con los lupinos.

action->+1 Status to All Saves vs. Poiso.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kquBnQ0kObZztnBc]
+1 estado a todas las salvaciones contra veneno

action->Change Shape.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.08egiRxOvMX97XTc]
Cambiar forma
action->Change Shape.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.08egiRxOvMX97XTc]
  • Humano
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo puño [[/r 1d20+16 #Fist]]{+16} / [[/r 1d20+11 #Fist]]{+12} / [[/r 1d20+6 #Fist]]{+8} (ágil, no letal), Daño @Damage[(1d6+7)[bludgeoning]] daño
  • Lobo
    • Velocidad 40 pies
    • Cuerpo a cuerpo mandíbulas [[/r 1d20+16 #Jaws]]{+16} / [[/r 1d20+11 #Jaws]]{+11} / [[/r 1d20+6 #Jaws]]{+6} , Daño @Damage[(2d8+7)[piercing]] daño más @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}

La criatura cambia a su forma humanoide, híbrida o animal. Cada forma tiene una apariencia específica y persistente. La forma natural de una verdadera criaturaes su forma híbrida.

En forma humanoide, el hombre criatura usa su tamaño humanoide original, pierde sus golpes de mandíbulas y garras y gana un golpe de puño cuerpo a cuerpo que inflige un daño contundente igual al daño cortante infligido por su garra.

En forma de animal, su Velocidad y tamaño cambian a los del animal, obtiene cualquier efecto de Golpe especial del animal que aún no tenía (como Agarrar) y pierde sus Golpes con arma.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

action->Curse of the Werewolf.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.ICnpftxZEilrYjn0]
Maldición del hombre lobo
action->Curse of the Werewolf.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.ICnpftxZEilrYjn0]

Esta maldición afecta sólo a los humanoides.

Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

En cada luna llena, la criatura maldita debe superar otra salvación de Fortaleza o convertirse en un hombre lobo hasta el amanecer.

La criatura está bajo el control del DJ y hace estragos durante la mitad de la noche antes de caer inconsciente enamanecer.

action->Moon Frenzy.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.FA0ri2fAcMa1HgZe]
Frenesí lunar
action->Moon Frenzy.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.FA0ri2fAcMa1HgZe]

Cuando aparece la luna llena en el cielo nocturno, Jaul debe entrar en su forma híbrida, no puede cambiar de forma a partir de entonces, se vuelve grande, aumenta su alcance en 5 pies y aumenta el daño de sus mandíbulas en 2.

Cuando la luna se pone o sale el sol, Jaul vuelve a su forma humanoide y es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigado} para [[/br 2d4 #Fatigued duration]]{2d4 hours}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{Effect: Moon Frenzy}

action->Wolf Coordination.name: Coordinación del lobo
action->Wolf Coordination.description: Los golpes de Jaul causan 1d6 daños adicionales a las criaturas dentro del alcance de su lobo.

action->Jaul Coordination.name: Coordinación de cárcel
action->Jaul Coordination.description: El lobo causa 1d6 daños adicionales a las criaturas dentro del alcance de Jaul.

Khurfel.name: khurfel
Khurfel.publicNotes: Khurfel lidera el grupo más grande y activo de adversarios que enfrentan los héroes en las Bóvedas de Abominación. Su predestinado enfrentamiento con los héroes es necesario porque sostiene la lente Emerald Fulcrum y se niega a renunciar a ella mientras viva, ya que simboliza el liderazgo de su culto. La visión de Khurfel de caer en manos de los héroes no inspira miedo, sino furia, y lucha contra sus enemigos profetizados mientras le quede aliento en el cuerpo.

spell->Read Omens.name: Read Omens
spell->Read Omens.description: You peek into the future. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You learn a cryptic clue or piece of advice that could help with the chosen event, often in the form of a rhyme or omen.

spell->Blindness.name: Blindness
spell->Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

spell->Paralyze.name: Paralyze
spell->Paralyze.description:
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is Paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Augury.name: Augury
spell->Augury.description:
You gain a vague glimpse of the future. During the casting of this spell, ask about the results of a particular course of action. The spell can predict results up to 30 minutes into the future and reveals the GM's best guess among the following outcomes:

  • Weal The results will be good.
  • Woe The results will be bad.
  • Weal and Woe The results will be a mix of good and bad.
  • Nothing There won't be particularly good or bad results.

The GM rolls a secret @Check[flat|dc:6|traits:secret]. On a failure, the result is always "nothing." This makes it impossible to tell whether a "nothing" result is accurate. If anyone asks about the same topic as the first casting of augury during an additional casting, the GM uses the secret roll result from the first casting. If circumstances change, though, it's possible to get a different result.

spell->Death Knell.name: Death Knell
spell->Death Knell.description:
You snuff the life out of a creature on the brink of death. The target must attempt a Will save. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value increases by 1.

Failure The target dies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.98XT2QUk6wvXIqf7]{Spell Effect: Death Knell}

spell->Feather Fall (At Will) (Self Only.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]
Caída de plumas (a voluntad) (solo para uno mismo)
spell->Feather Fall (At Will) (Self Only.description:
Trigger a creature within range is falling

You cause the air itself to arrest a fall. The target's fall slows to 60 feet per round, and the portion of the fall during the spell's duration doesn't count when calculating falling damage. If the target reaches the ground while the spell is in effect, it takes no damage from the fall. The spell ends as soon as the target lands.

spell->Harm.name: Harm
spell->Harm.description:
You channel void energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal 1d8 void damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse void energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
spell->Harm.target: 1 living creature or 1 willing undead creature

spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]
Rayo de debilitamiento
spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
A ray that saps a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save to determine the spell's effect. If your attack roll is a critical success, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.

weapon->Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
weapon->Heavy Crossbow.description: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.

weapon->+1 Striking Rhoka Sword.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.k8V3wTG1gMU5ksUr]
+1 Espada Rhoka de golpe
weapon->+1 Striking Rhoka Sword.description: The rhoka sword is the preferred weapon of urdefhan soldiers, though all urdefhans know how to wield these instruments of war.

armor->Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
armor->Chain Mail.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

equipment->Emerald Fulcrum Lens.name: Emerald Fulcrum Lens
equipment->Emerald Fulcrum Lens.description:
This concave green lens is pitted and flawed; its jagged edges can cut those who don't handle it with care. While you have the Emerald Fulcrum Lens invested, your flesh appears waxen and pallid. You gain void healing and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spells gain a +4 status bonus to the Hit Points they restore to you. You can also activate the lens in the following ways.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.vlTiBE0h2kyw5J9o]{Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens}

Activate 2 Interact (healing)

Frequency once per day

Effect You grasp the Emerald Fulcrum Lens in one hand, regain [[/r 30[healing]]]{30 Hit Points}, and gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against magic for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.rH6RHxy6sNTLusKX]{Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Throw)}

Activate 2 Interact (attack, possession)

While grasping the lens, make a melee spell attack roll with a modifier of [[/r d20+20]]{+20}. On a hit, you force the splinter of Nhimbaloth's essence from the lens to possess the target. You're no longer invested in the lens, and the target gains the benefits as though it had invested the lens but can't activate the lens's other abilities. This effect is permanent, but it can be ended by any effect that removes a possession effect. The lens doesn't have any magical abilities until the possession effect ends; when it does, the essence returns to the lens.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

effect->Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Sa.name: Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Throw)
effect->Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Sa.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.rH6RHxy6sNTLusKX]

Durante 1 asalto obtienes un bono de +1 por objeto a las tiradas de ataque, tiros de salvación y CD.

action->Necrotic Decay.name: Decaimiento necrótico
action->Necrotic Decay.description: Cuando Khurfel muere, su carne invisible se pudre rápidamente y se sublima en un gas maloliente que llena un @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] alrededor de su cuerpo. El gas causa @Damage[10d6[void]] daño a las criaturas en esta área ya que su carne también se cuaja y se pudre (salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true]).

action->Frenzied Attack.name: Ataque frenético
action->Frenzied Attack.description:
Khurfel realiza un golpe con espada rhoka y dos golpes con mandíbulas contra una o dos criaturas diferentes (dividiendo los ataques como desee).

Su penalización por ataques múltiples no aumenta hasta después de los tres ataques.

action->Insightful Swing.name: Columpio perspicaz
action->Insightful Swing.description: Khurfel realiza un ataque con arma cuerpo a cuerpo. En este Golpe, obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +2 a la tirada de ataque e ignora cualquier ocultación que tenga el objetivo.

action->Wicked Bite.name: Mordedura malvada
action->Wicked Bite.description:
Requisitos Khurfel dañó a una criatura con un golpe de mandíbulas en su última acción

Efecto Khurfel mantiene el contacto, volviendo la carne de la criatura translúcida alrededor de la herida. Khurfel elige una de dos opciones, cada una de las cuales requiere una partida guardada @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]. Si el golpe de las mandíbulas fue un golpe crítico, la criatura sufre ambos efectos, usando el mismo resultado de salvación para ambos.

  • Drenar Sangre Khurfel bebe un poco de la sangre de la criatura. En una salvación fallida, la criatura es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} y ​​Khurfel recupera [[/r 10[healing]]]{10 HP} (o, en un fallo crítico, es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} y ​​Khurfel recupera [[/r 20[healing]]]{20 HP} ).
  • Drain Vitality Khurfel extrae parte de la esencia vital de la criatura. La criatura se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} durante 1 hora en una salvación fallida (o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} durante 1hora en caso de fallo crítico).

Kragala.name: Kragala
Kragala.saveDetails: +2 estado a todas las salvaciones vs. magia

spell->Death Knell.name: Death Knell
spell->Death Knell.description:
You snuff the life out of a creature on the brink of death. The target must attempt a Will save. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value increases by 1.

Failure The target dies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.98XT2QUk6wvXIqf7]{Spell Effect: Death Knell}

spell->Enlarge (Self Only).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]
Ampliar (solo uno mismo)
spell->Enlarge (Self Only).description:
Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. Its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sPCWrhUHqlbGhYSD]{Spell Effect: Enlarge}

Heightened (4th) The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell and apply its effects to up to 10 willing creatures.

spell->Invisibility (Self Only).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]
Invisibilidad (solo uno mismo)
spell->Invisibility (Self Only).description:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

spell->Sound Burst.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzLkNU3AAqOSKFPR]
Explosión de sonido
spell->Sound Burst.description:
A cacophonous noise blasts out, dealing 2d10 sonic damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is Deafened for 1 minute, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

spell->Telekinetic Maneuver.name: Telekinetic Maneuver
spell->Telekinetic Maneuver.description: With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

spell->Bless.name: Bless
spell->Bless.description:
Blessings from beyond help your companions strike true. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bless, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet.

Bless can counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RfCEHpMoEAZvB9IZ]{Aura: Bless}
spell->Bless.target: you and allies in the area

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
spell->Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Guidance.name: Guidance
spell->Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}

spell->Magic Missile.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]
Misil mágico
spell->Magic Missile.description:
You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

spell->Mending.name: Mending
spell->Mending.description:
You repair the target item. You restore 5 Hit Points per spell rank to the target, potentially removing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. You can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

Heightened (2nd) You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Heightened (3rd) You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.
spell->Mending.target: non-magical object of light Bulk or less

spell->Protection.name: Protection
spell->Protection.description:
You ward a creature against a specified alignment. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful when you cast this spell. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against creatures and effects of the chosen alignment. This bonus increases to +3 against effects from such creatures that would directly control the target and against attacks made by summoned creatures of the chosen alignment.

This spell gains the trait that opposes the alignment you chose-if you choose chaos, this spell gains the lawful trait, and vice versa; if you choose evil, this spell gains the good trait, and vice versa.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RawLEPwyT5CtCZ4D]{Spell Effect: Protection}

spell->Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
spell->Sanctuary.description:
You ward a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

spell->Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
spell->Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

weapon->Drumstick.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FibwLZ12EIEwLGhw]
Palillo de tambor
weapon->Drumstick.description: This smaller version of the warhammer has a wooden or metal shaft ending in a metal head. Unlike its heavier cousin, it is light enough to throw.

equipment->Folding Drums.name: Folding Drums
equipment->Folding Drums.description:
You can unfold this @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.yw1kPxsdCoDUzOaE]{virtuoso percussion instrument} into a hand drum (1 Bulk), a marching drum set with a shoulder harness and back brace (3 Bulk), or a large standing drum set with a built-in stool (16 Bulk). Changing the folding drum's size is a 3-action Interact activity, and the drums must have sufficient open space to accommodate their new size.

Activate 1 Interact (concentrate)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play a pounding rhythm on the drum. If the next action you use is to cast a composition cantrip that has an emanation, increase the area of the emanation by 30 feet.

action->+2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kquBnQ0kObZztnBc]
+2 de estado a todas las partidas guardadas frente a Magic

action->Knock It Away.name: Derribarlo
action->Knock It Away.description:
Desencadenante Kragala sostiene una baqueta y es atacado con un arma a distancia por un atacante que puede ver

Efecto Kragala obtiene un bono de circunstancia +2 a la CA contra el ataque desencadenante.

action->Guiding Rhythm.name: Ritmo guía
action->Guiding Rhythm.description: Cuando Kragala lanza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} mientras usa un instrumento de percusión, sus objetivos no se vuelven temporalmente inmunes a su guía.

action->Percussive Reverberation.name: Reverberación percusiva
action->Percussive Reverberation.description: Kragala causa 1d6 de daño adicional con martillos, incluidas las baquetas (ya incluidas en el daño de los Golpes).

Lady's Whisper.name: El susurro de la dama
Lady's Whisper.saveDetails: +1 estado a todas las salvaciones vs. magia

spell->True Seeing (Constant).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]
Visión verdadera (constante)
spell->True Seeing (Constant).description: You see things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, you can see the creature's true form, but you don't end the polymorph spell).

spell->Crushing Despair.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]
Desesperación aplastante
spell->Crushing Despair.description:
You inflict despair on creatures in the area. The effects for each creature are determined by its Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success For 1 round, the creature can't use reactions and must attempt another save at the start of its turn; on a failure, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Heightened (7th) The area increases to a 60-foot cone.

spell->Mind Probe.name: Mind Probe
spell->Mind Probe.description:
You cast your thoughts through a creature's mind, sifting for information. You access the target's memories and knowledge unless it fends you off with a Will save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure Each round of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the Spell to ask a different question and attempt to uncover the answer. For each question, the target can attempt a Deception check against your spell DC; if the target succeeds, you don't learn the answer, and on a critical success, the target gives you a false answer that you believe is truthful Once you've asked the target a given question, asking it again, even with a separate casting of mind probe, produces the same result.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target takes a -4 circumstance penalty to Deception checks against your questions.

spell->Shadow Blast.name: Shadow Blast
spell->Shadow Blast.description:
You shape the quasi-real substance of the Shadow Plane into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, or sonic damage, and choose a @Template[cone|distance:30], a @Template[burst|distance:15] within 120 feet, or a @Template[line|distance:50]. The blast deals 5d8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

spell->Blink.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]
Parpadear
spell->Blink.description:
You blink quickly between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane. You gain resistance 5 to all damage (except force). You can Sustain the Spell to vanish and reappear 10 feet away in a random direction determined by the GM; the movement doesn't trigger reactions. At the end of your turn, you vanish and reappear as above.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{Spell Effect: Blink}

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 3.

spell->Gaseous Form.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]
Forma gaseosa
spell->Gaseous Form.description:
The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sILRkGTwoBywy0BU]{Spell Effect: Vapor Form}

spell->Modify Memory.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]
Modificar memoria
spell->Modify Memory.description:
You alter the target's memories, either erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of modify memory, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the Spell to modify a memory once each round. When you do, you imagine up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

Any memories you've altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, you can't alter any further memories.

Heightened (6th) You can cast the spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

spell->Phantasmal Killer.name: Phantasmal Killer
spell->Phantasmal Killer.description:
You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the target. Only the spell's target can see the killer, though you can see the vague shape of the illusion as it races forth to attack. The effect of the killer is based on the outcome of the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes 4d6 mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target takes 8d6 mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is so afraid it might die. It must attempt a Fortitude save; if the target fails, it dies. On a successful Fortitude save, the target takes 12d6 mental damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} until the end of its next turn, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}. This effect has the incapacitation trait.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6 on a failure and by 3d6 on a critical failure.

spell->Haste (Constant).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]
Prisa (constante)
spell->Haste (Constant).description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

spell->Hypercognition.name: Hypercognition
spell->Hypercognition.description: You rapidly catalog and collate information relevant to your current situation. You can instantly use up to 6 Recall Knowledge actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge.

spell->Levitate.name: Levitate
spell->Levitate.description:
You defy gravity and levitate the target 5 feet off the ground. For the duration of the spell, you can move the target up or down 10 feet with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. A creature floating in the air from levitate takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. A floating creature can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn. If the target is adjacent to a fixed object or terrain of suitable stability, it can move across the surface by climbing (if the surface is vertical, like a wall) or crawling (if the surface is horizontal, such as a ceiling). The GM determines which surfaces can be climbed or crawled across.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{Spell Effect: Levitate}

spell->Paralyze.name: Paralyze
spell->Paralyze.description:
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is Paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Slow.name: Slow
spell->Slow.description:
You dilate the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 minute.

Heightened (6th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Vampiric Touch.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.N1Z1oLPdBxaSgrEE]
Toque vampírico
spell->Vampiric Touch.description:
Your touch leeches the lifeblood out of a target to empower yourself. You deal 6d6 void damage to the target. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the void damage the target takes (after applying resistances and the like). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

spell->Calm Emotions.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]
Calmar las emociones
spell->Calm Emotions.description:
You forcibly calm creatures in the area, soothing them into a nonviolent state; each creature must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success Calming urges impose a -1 status penalty to the creature's attack rolls.

Failure Any emotion effects that would affect the creature are suppressed and the creature can't use hostile actions. If the target is subject to hostility from any other creature, it ceases to be affected by calm emotions.

Critical Failure As failure, but hostility doesn't end the effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Qr5rgoZvI4KmFY0N]{Spell Effect: Calm}

spell->Death Knell.name: Death Knell
spell->Death Knell.description:
You snuff the life out of a creature on the brink of death. The target must attempt a Will save. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} value increases by 1.

Failure The target dies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.98XT2QUk6wvXIqf7]{Spell Effect: Death Knell}

spell->Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
spell->Mirror Image.description:
Three illusory images of you swirl about your space, potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the images instead of you. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on [[/r 1d4]]). With two images remaining, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1-2 on [[/r 1d6]]). With only one image, the chances are 1 in 2 (1-3 on [[/r 1d6]]).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys an image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0PO5mFRhh9HxGAtv]{Spell Effect: Mirror Image}

spell->See Invisibility (Constant).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]
Ver Invisibilidad (Constante)
spell->See Invisibility (Constant).description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{Spell Effect: See the Unseen}

spell->Touch of Idiocy.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CQb8HtQ1BPeZmu9h]
Toque de idiotez
spell->Touch of Idiocy.description:
You dull the target's mind; the target must attempt a Will save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4}.

spell->Command.name: Command
spell->Command.description:
You shout a command that's hard to ignore. You can command the target to approach you, run away (as if it had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition), release what it's holding, drop @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or stand in place. It can't Delay or take any reactions until it has obeyed your command. The effects depend on the target's Will save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure For the first action on its next turn, the creature must use a single action to do as you command.

Critical Failure The target must use all its actions on its next turn to obey your command.

Heightened (5th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Fear.name: Fear
spell->Fear.description:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to five creatures.

spell->Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
spell->Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
spell->Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (3rd) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise}

spell->Mage Hand.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]
Mano de mago
spell->Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.
spell->Mage Hand.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

spell->Magic Missile.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]
Misil mágico
spell->Magic Missile.description:
You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

spell->Shield.name: Shield
spell->Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

spell->Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
spell->Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

action->Death's Grace.name: La gracia de la muerte
action->Death's Grace.description: Lady's Whisper puede elegir si cuenta o no como muerto viviente para los efectos que afectan a los muertos vivientes de manera diferente. Incluso si no cuenta como no-muerto, Lady's Whisper nunca cuenta como una criatura viviente.

action->+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 estado a todas las partidas guardadas contra Magic

action->Negative Recovery.name: Recuperación negativa
action->Negative Recovery.description: Lady's Whisper puede elegir si recibe o no daño de vitalidad.

action->Sibilant Whispers.name: Susurros sibilantes
action->Sibilant Whispers.description: 20 pies. Cada criatura que comienza su turno dentro del aura y puede escuchar los siniestros susurros debe superar una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:30] o convertirse en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Asustado 2}. Si tiene éxito, la criatura es temporalmente inmune durante 1 minuto.

action->Gatekeeper's Will.name: La voluntad del portero
action->Gatekeeper's Will.description: Lady's Whisper mentalmente hace que cualquier puerta o portal dentro de la Puerta de Nhimbaloth (áreas B60 a B64 y áreas C1 a C18) se abra o cierre. Si Lady's Whisper quiere cerrar una puerta, debe forzarla para abrirla o derribarla.

action->Unwilling Teleportation.name: Teletransportación renuente
action->Unwilling Teleportation.description: Cuando Lady's Whisper golpea y daña a una criatura con su golpe de garra, puede elegir teletransportar a esa criatura a cualquier espacio abierto dentro de 15 pies, incluso si Lady's Whisper no puede ver el destino. El objetivo puede intentar una tirada de salvación @Check[type:will|dc:30] para resistir este efecto.

Mister Beak.name: Señor pico
Mister Beak.publicNotes:
Las muñecas Soulbound son maniquíes o juguetes espeluznantes que han sido imbuidos de un pequeño trozo del alma de un mortal fallecido. Estos pequeños constructos se crean por diversas razones, como servir como compañeros o sirvientes, pero su libre albedrío significa que su obediencia a sus creadores difícilmente es un hecho. Los seguidores de Pharasma generalmente aborrecen las muñecas ligadas al alma, considerándolas una perversión del ciclo natural de las almas, y aquellos que adoran a la Señora de las Tumbas ven la destrucción de unmuñeca ligada al alma, independientemente de la alineación de la construcción, como un servicio importante al Gran Más Allá. Los muñecos con almas son los más simples de una serie de construcciones con almas que incluyen maniquíes con almas de tamaño humano, poderosas conchas con almas y guerreros de terracota centinelas con almas. Crearlos a partir de criaturas vivientes que no lo deseen es malvado, y un donante que no lo desee puede resistir el proceso con una salvación de Voluntad exitosa contra el Craft DC del creador, arruinando el muñeco si no evitando que el donante lo haga.muerte. Una muñeca no maligna sólo puede elaborarse a partir del alma de una persona que haya dado su consentimiento para dicho uso antes de que ocurriera su muerte

Los muñecos vinculados al alma que encuentran los aventureros suelen ser guardianes de algún tipo; A pesar de su diminuto tamaño, el poder del fragmento de alma hace que el puño del muñeco sea más peligroso de lo que un observador casual esperaría. Además, le otorga al muñeco un único hechizo de poder descomunal dada su estatura. Por su autonomía y notableinteligencia, los artesanos emplean ocasionalmente muñecos ligados al alma como administradores de construcciones mucho más poderosas pero sin sentido, como los golems, lo que les permite controlar defensas mucho más allá de sus propias capacidades. Aunque las muñecas con alma contienen un pequeño fragmento de un alma extraída durante o poco después de la muerte de una persona, esto no afecta la resurrección del difunto ni su progreso hacia la otra vida. Este proceso de extracción es letal para los posibles donantes de almas que de otro modo estarían vivos.aunque hay rumores de procesos más costosos que permiten a alguien donar un fragmento de un alma viviente sin repercusiones.

El fragmento de alma reside en una gema de enfoque del alma típicamente incrustada en el cuello o el pecho de la muñeca. El fragmento de alma no es estático y la muñeca continúa aprendiendo desde su estado inicial, lo que significa que su personalidad y habilidades pueden cambiar, posiblemente acercándose a las del donante o avanzando más en su propio camino individual. el alma ligadaLa gema de enfoque de la muñeca conserva los recuerdos de la muñeca incluso después de su destrucción. La gema de enfoque del alma intacta de una muñeca destruida puede incluso ser colocada en un nuevo cuerpo de muñeca por alguien con conocimientos en la creación de criaturas ligadas al alma, reconstituyendo efectivamente la muñeca ligada al alma.

spell->Levitate.name: Levitate
spell->Levitate.description:
You defy gravity and levitate the target 5 feet off the ground. For the duration of the spell, you can move the target up or down 10 feet with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. A creature floating in the air from levitate takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. A floating creature can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn. If the target is adjacent to a fixed object or terrain of suitable stability, it can move across the surface by climbing (if the surface is vertical, like a wall) or crawling (if the surface is horizontal, such as a ceiling). The GM determines which surfaces can be climbed or crawled across.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{Spell Effect: Levitate}

spell->Light.name: Light
spell->Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).
spell->Light.target: 1 objeto de 1 volumen o menos, ya sea desatendido o poseído por ti o por un aliado dispuesto

spell->Mage Hand.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]
Mano de mago
spell->Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.
spell->Mage Hand.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

spell->Phantom Pain.name: Phantom Pain
spell->Phantom Pain.description:
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately.

Failure The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. If the target recovers from being Sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.

@Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,mental]]{Scaling Persistent Mental Damage}

spell->Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
spell->Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

treasure->Soul Gem.name: Gema del alma
treasure->Soul Gem.description: La gema de enfoque del alma de Mister Beak está ubicada en su espalda, acurrucada entre sus alas.

action->Personality Fragments.name: Fragmentos de personalidad
action->Personality Fragments.description: Mister Beak comparte fragmentos del alma de su donante, el duende Borbo, pero ninguno de los recuerdos de Borbo.

Morlock Cultist.name: Cultista Morlock
Morlock Cultist.publicNotes:
Los Morlocks que sirven como sacerdotes en sus cónclaves suelen incursionar en misteriosas magias ocultas.

Los Morlocks se originan a partir de humanos perdidos hace mucho tiempo en el mundo de la superficie. Tienen afinidad por la maquinaria, la basura y los extraños comportamientos ocultos.
Morlock Cultist.saveDetails: +2 de estado a todas las salvaciones contra enfermedades y venenos.

spell->Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image

Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your images instead of you. If all three images remain, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on [[/r 1d4]]). @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0PO5mFRhh9HxGAtv]{Spell Effect: Mirror Image}

spell->Telekinetic Maneuver.name: Telekinetic Maneuver
spell->Telekinetic Maneuver.description: With a rush of telekinetic power, you move a foe or something they carry. You can attempt to Disarm, Shove, or Trip the target using a spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check.

spell->Bane.name: Bane
spell->Bane.description:
You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt.

Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area.

Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bane, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw.

Bane can counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UTLp7omqsiC36bso]{Spell Effect: Bane}

spell->Daze.description:

If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Grim Tendrils.name: Grim Tendrils
spell->Grim Tendrils.description:
Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]] damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage.

Heightened (+1) The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

spell->Phantom Pain.name: Phantom Pain
spell->Phantom Pain.description:
