action->Rejuvenation.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.unR8VVR4yyRnsmnB]

Asegurar los cuatro íconos de Roseguard y colocarlos en el altar en el área D13 le permite a Otari pasar a la otra vida.

Cuando un fantasma es destruido, se vuelve a formar después de [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} dentro de la ubicación a la que está vinculado, completamente curado. Un fantasma puede ser destruido permanentemente sólo si alguien determina el motivo de su existencia.y corrige lo que impide que el espíritu descanse.

action->Filth Fever.name: Fiebre de la inmundicia
action->Filth Fever.description:
Las condiciones @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} de la fiebre inmundicia no mejoran por sí solas hasta que la enfermedad se cura.

Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Etapa 1 portador sin efectos nocivos ( [[/br 1d4 #Incubation]]{1d4 hours} )

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 1} (1 día)

Etapa 3 Enfermo 1 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} mientras la criatura afectada permanezca enferma (1 día)

Etapa 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} (1 día)

Etapa 5 muerto

action->Infested Shadow.name: Sombra infestada
action->Infested Shadow.description:
Otari se desvanece, emerge momentáneamente de la sombra de otra criatura a 30 pies y hace un golpe con su mano fantasmal contra un único objetivo al alcance de esta criatura (pero no contra la criatura cuya sombra infesta).

En un ataque exitoso, el objetivo también es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} hasta el comienzo del siguiente turno de Otari. Otari luego reaparece en su punto de partida.

La criatura cuya sombra infesta Otari queda expuestaa la fiebre de la inmundicia.

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

Otari inflige 2d6 de daño de precisión adicional a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

spell->Suggestion.name: Suggestion
spell->Suggestion.description:
Your honeyed words are difficult for creatures to resist. You suggest a course of action to the target, which must be phrased in such a way as to seem like a logical course of action to the target and can't be self-destructive or obviously against the target's self-interest. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and knows you tried to control it.

Success The target is unaffected and thinks you were talking to them normally, not casting a spell on them.

Failure The target immediately follows your suggestion. The spell has a duration of 1 minute, or until the target has completed a finite suggestion or the suggestion becomes self-destructive or has other obvious negative effects.

Critical Failure As failure, but the base duration is 1 hour.

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Blindness.name: Blindness
spell->Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

spell->Enthrall.name: Enthrall
spell->Enthrall.description:
Your words fascinate your targets. You speak or sing without interruption throughout the casting and duration. Targets who notice your speech or song might give their undivided attention; each target must attempt a Will save. The GM might grant a circumstance bonus (to a maximum of +4) if the target is of an opposing religion, ancestry, or political leaning, or is otherwise unlikely to agree with what you're saying.

Each creature that comes within range has to attempt a save when you Sustain the Spell. If you're speaking, enthrall gains the linguistic trait.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and notices that you tried to use magic.

Success The target needn't pay attention but doesn't notice you tried to use magic (it might notice others are enthralled).

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with you. It can attempt another Will save if it witnesses actions or speech with which it disagrees. If it succeeds, it's no longer Fascinated and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. If the target is subject to a hostile act, or if another creature succeeds at a Diplomacy or Intimidation check against it, the fascination ends immediately.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target can't attempt a save to end the fascination if it disagrees with you.

spell->Paralyze.name: Paralyze
spell->Paralyze.description:
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, threatening to freeze the target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is Paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Darkness.name: Darkness
spell->Darkness.description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

spell->Darkness (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]
Oscuridad (a voluntad)
spell->Darkness (At Will).description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

spell->Invisibility.name: Invisibility
spell->Invisibility.description:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

spell->Obscuring Mist (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]
Niebla oscurecedora (a voluntad)
spell->Obscuring Mist (At Will).description: You call forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the mist become Concealed to creatures within it. You can Dismiss the cloud.

spell->Chill Touch.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]
Toque frío
spell->Chill Touch.description:
Siphoning void energy into yourself, your hand radiates a pale darkness. Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead.

  • Living Creature The spell deals void damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round on a critical failure.
  • Undead Creature The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

Heightened (+1) The void damage to living creatures increases by 1d4.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Phantom Pain.name: Phantom Pain
spell->Phantom Pain.description:
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately.

Failure The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. If the target recovers from being Sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.

@Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,mental]]{Scaling Persistent Mental Damage}

spell->Shield.name: Shield
spell->Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

weapon->Dagger.name: Dagger
weapon->Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

armor->Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
armor->Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

consumable->Wand of Magic Missile (Level.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wrDmWkGxmwzYtfiA]
Varita de misil mágico (nivel 3)
consumable->Wand of Magic Missile (Level.consumableSpellDescription:
You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.
consumable->Wand of Magic Missile (Level.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wrDmWkGxmwzYtfiA]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage}

Este bastón mide aproximadamente un pie de largo y contiene un solo hechizo. La apariencia normalmente se relaciona con el hechizo interior.

Activar Lanzar un hechizo

Frecuencia una vez al día, más recargo

Efecto Lanzas el Hechizo al nivel indicado.

Requisitos de artesanía Proporcionar un lanzamiento del hechizo del nivel indicado.

action->Death Flame.name: Llama de la muerte
action->Death Flame.description:
Cuando Padli muere, su cuerpo arde en un destello de llama candente. Todas las criaturas en un @Template[type:burst|distance:20] reciben @Damage[6d10[fire]] daño (salvación @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]).

Su equipo no se ve afectado por las llamas y queda en una pila donde murió.

action->Occult Ward.name: Barrio oculto
action->Occult Ward.description:
Desencadenante Padli intenta una tirada de salvación contra un hechizo lanzado por una criatura que puede ver

Efecto Padli obtiene una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a la salvación que activa.

action->Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
action->Sneak Attack.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.AWvNPE4U0kEJSL1T]

Padli inflige 3d6 de daño de precisión adicional a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} criaturas.

Painful Suggestion Trap.name: Trampa de sugerencia dolorosa
Painful Suggestion Trap.description: Una runa oculta en el suelo debajo de la suciedad, justo después del umbral, activa un fantasma sucedáneo.
Painful Suggestion Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:28|name:Remove Rune|traits:magical,trap] (experto) para eliminar la runa sin activarla, o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (4to nivel; contrarrestar CD 26) para disipar la runa
Painful Suggestion Trap.reset: La trampa se reinicia automáticamente después de 1 hora.

action->Counterfeit Haunting.name: Falsificación inquietante
action->Counterfeit Haunting.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura viviente se mueve sobre la runa

Efecto Un gemido espantoso resuena por la habitación y una voz ronca telepática grita: "¡Fuera!"

Este grito causa @Damage[6d12[mental]] daño a las criaturas en la habitación ( @Check[type:will|dc:26|basic:true] salvación). Las criaturas que fallen esta tirada de salvación deben abandonar inmediatamente la habitación y no pueden volver a entrar voluntariamente durante 1 minuto (1 hora en caso crítico).falla).

Paralyzing Light Trap.name: Trampa de luz paralizante
Paralyzing Light Trap.description: Cuando cualquier criatura que no sea un demonio entra en la luz, la magia entretejida en la luz mantiene a la criatura en su lugar y hace sonar una alarma.
Paralyzing Light Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Distort or Diffuse the Light|traits:magical,trap] (maestro) para distorsionar o difundir la luz, manteniendo el cono de luz intacto pero evitando que se active la trampa, o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (4to nivel; contrarrestar CD 26) para disipar la luz, dejando la habitación en oscuridad
Paralyzing Light Trap.reset: La magia de estasis en la luz se acumula en el transcurso de una hora, después de la cual la trampa puede activarse nuevamente.
Paralyzing Light Trap.routine: (1 acción) Todas las criaturas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizado} en la habitación reciben @Damage[1d10[mental]] daño (@Check[type:will|dc:26|basic:true|traits:magical,trap] salvación). Las criaturas que fallan también quedan paralizadas durante 1 asalto, pero pueden usar una reacción para luchar mentalmente contra esta estasis; las criaturas que lo hacen reciben @Damage[5d10[mental]] daño mental pero ya no quedan paralizadas.

action->Stasis Field.name: Campo de estasis
action->Stasis Field.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura no diabólica se mueve hacia la luz

Efecto La luz se expande para llenar la habitación, y cada criatura no diabólica dentro de la habitación debe intentar una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:26]. Suena un timbre agudo en el cuartel (área D15 ), audible también en esta sala. La trampa luego tira iniciativa.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no se ve afectado.

Éxito El objetivo es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Aturdido 2} .

Fallo El objetivo es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizado} durante 1 ronda.

Fallo crítico El objetivo es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante [[/br 1d4 #Duration Anonadado]]{1d4 rounds} y ​​queda paralizado durante 1 asalto.

Poisoning Room Specter.name: Espectro de la habitación de envenenamiento
Poisoning Room Specter.publicNotes:
Cuando una criatura mortal malvada muere, a veces regresa para rondar el área de su muerte como un espectro, un remanente odioso, siempre buscando matar a otros, particularmente humanoides, en un intento de distribuir su dolor entre tantas almas como pueda. Un espectro mantiene una extraña apariencia de su identidad anterior, pero con un sentido de propósito corrupto. No se puede razonar con ello.

Un espectro al que se le niega la oportunidad de dañar a humanoides vivos se vuelve cada vez más agonizante yirracional, similar a la mentalidad de una persona hambrienta a la que siempre se le ha negado la liberación de la agonía a través de la muerte.

action->Telepathy (with spectral thralls.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]
Telepatía (solo con esclavos espectrales)

action->Frightful Presence.name: Frightful Presence
action->Frightful Presence.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.etMnv73EIdEZrYYu]

30 pies. @Check[type:will|dc:22]

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

action->Pain Starvation.name: Dolor hambre
action->Pain Starvation.description: Un espectro que pasa más de un mes sin causar daño del Vacío a un humanoide vivo se vuelve desesperado y casi salvaje. Cambia el alineamiento de maldad legal a maldad caótica, pierde el control de cualquier esclavo corrupto que pueda tener y se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Acelerado} . Puede usar su acción adicional sólo para realizar viles golpes de toque contra objetivos humanoides. Al final de cualquier turno en el que cause cualquier cantidad de daño por vacío a un humanoide vivo, vuelve a ser malvado legal y esYa no se acelera, pero cualquier esclavo del que perdió el control permanece libre.

action->Sunlight Powerlessness.name: Impotencia de la luz del sol
action->Sunlight Powerlessness.description: Un espectro atrapado en la luz del sol es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 2} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} mientras permanezca a la luz del sol.

action->Spectral Corruption.name: Corrupción espectral
action->Spectral Corruption.description:
El espectro hace un vil toque Golpe. Si daña a una criatura viviente, el espectro gana 5 puntos de vida temporales y la criatura objetivo debe intentar una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:24] para evitar corromperse.

Éxito crítico La criatura no se ve afectada y es temporalmente inmune a la corrupción espectral durante 1 minuto.

Éxito La criatura es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 hora.

Fracaso La criatura sucumbe a la corrupción y se convierte temporalmente en un esclavo espectral. La criatura es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlado} por el espectro, obedeciendo las órdenes telepáticas o habladas del espectro, aunque un esclavo espectral no obedece órdenes obviamente autodestructivas. Esto dura hasta el final del siguiente turno del esclavo, momento en el cual ya no está controlado sino que se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 hora.

Fallo crítico Como fallo, pero la duración es ilimitada. El esclavo puede intentar una nueva salvación de Voluntad al final de cada uno de sus turnos; con un éxito, ya no está controlado por el espectro sino que se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado 2} durante 1 hora.

Quara Orshendiel.name: Quara Orshendiel
Quara Orshendiel.publicNotes:
Quara probablemente se convertirá en una aliada de los héroes, ya que reconoce compañeros útiles cuando los ve. Está interesada en vengar a su padre y a su hermana, pero sabe que cualquier objetivo que persiguiera su padre con la lente Ochre Fulcrum podría resultar fundamental para liberar a Yldaris del control de Belcorra para siempre. Ha aprendido que la lente ocre era sólo una de las tres lentes que Belcorra confió a sus aliados en la región hace siglos, y pone a los héroes en el camino de la recuperación.ellos y descubrir más. La pista más importante que Quara les brinda a los héroes es que su padre se dirigía hacia una antigua bóveda en el borde del lago, para que los héroes puedan descubrir más en ese lugar.

Los héroes podrían ver a los drow como enemigos y atacar a Yldaris. En este caso, Quara hace todo lo posible para proteger a su gente, confiando en el entrenamiento de tirador que aún perdura en sus rápidos dedos. Probablemente no confiará a los héroes ninguna información después de talagresiones, pero podrían encontrar algunas pistas en sus habitaciones.
Quara Orshendiel.saveDetails: +1 estado a todas las salvaciones versus magia, +2 estado a todas las salvaciones versus mentales

spell->Darkness (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]
Oscuridad (a voluntad)
spell->Darkness (At Will).description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

spell->Faerie Fire (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]
Fuego de hadas (a voluntad)
spell->Faerie Fire (At Will).description: All creatures in the area when you cast the spell are limned in colorful, heatless fire of a color of your choice for the duration. Visible creatures can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by faerie fire. If the creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they are Concealed while affected by faerie fire, rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

spell->Dancing Lights.name: Luces danzantes
spell->Dancing Lights.description: Creas hasta cuatro luces flotantes, ninguna de las cuales está a más de 10 pies de distancia. Cada uno arroja luz como una antorcha. Cuando sostienes el hechizo, puedes mover cualquier cantidad de luces hasta 60 pies. Cada luz debe permanecer a 120 pies de usted y a 10 pies de todas las demás, o parpadeará.

weapon->+1 Striking Kukri.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TDrO7Xdyn7juFy3c]
+1 Kukri llamativo
weapon->+1 Striking Kukri.description: The blade of this foot-long knife curves inward and lacks a cross guard at the hilt.

weapon->Repeating Hand Crossbow.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow
weapon->Repeating Hand Crossbow.description: This handheld crossbow features an ingeniously designed catch mechanism at the top of the flight groove, just in front of the latch, which automatically loads a bolt from a magazine and resets the string each time the weapon is fired. A typical repeating hand crossbow magazine holds five bolts.

armor->Chain Shirt.name: Chain Shirt
armor->Chain Shirt.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

equipment->Shootist Bandolier.name: Shootist Bandolier
equipment->Shootist Bandolier.description: This leather bandolier holds up to three @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazines} in leather pockets that pop open with the quick flick of a thumb. You reduce the reload time for a repeating hand crossbow magazine from the bandolier by 1, to a total of 2 actions. You can wear only one shootist bandolier at a time.

consumable->Stupor Poison.name: Stupor Poison
consumable->Stupor Poison.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.nn2HAN1XKkKHfVnM]

Activar 2 Interactuar

El veneno de estupor es una destilación más potente de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison}. Una mayor exposición al veneno de estupor no requiere que el objetivo intente tiradas de salvación adicionales; Sólo fallar una tirada de salvación contra una exposición en curso puede avanzar en su etapa.

Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Duración máxima 6 horas

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} y ​​con la guardia baja (1 asalto)

Etapa 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} sin control de Percepción para despertar (1ronda)

Etapa 4 inconsciente sin control de Percepción para despertar ( [[/r 1d6 #hours]]{1d6 hours} )

action->+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 estado a todas las partidas guardadas contra Magic

action->+2 Status To All Saves vs. Menta.name: +2 Estado a todas las salvaciones vs. Mental

action->Commanding Aura.name: Aura dominante
action->Commanding Aura.description: 30 pies. Los drow alrededor de Quara se sienten alentados por su presencia. Sus aliados drow en el aura obtienen una bonificación de estado de +1 a las tiradas de ataque y pruebas de habilidad.

action->Deny Advantage.name: Negar ventaja
action->Deny Advantage.description: Quara no está desprevenido ante criaturas ocultas, no detectadas o flanqueantes de nivel 11 o inferior, ni ante criaturas de nivel 11 o inferior usando Ataque Sorpresa.

action->Evasion.name: Evasión
action->Evasion.description: Cuando Quara obtiene un éxito en una tirada de salvación de Reflejos, obtiene un éxito crítico.

action->Defensive Shooter.name: Tirador defensivo
action->Defensive Shooter.description: Los ataques a distancia de Quara no provocan reacciones.

action->Poison Weapon.name: Arma venenosa
action->Poison Weapon.description:
Requisitos Quara sostiene un arma perforante o cortante y tiene la mano libre

Efecto Quara aplica veneno al arma.

action->Reloading Trick.name: Truco de recarga
action->Reloading Trick.description:
Requisitos Quara sostiene una ballesta de mano de repetición descargada

Efecto Quara Interactúa para recargar la ballesta de mano repetida y golpea con ella.

action->Shootist's Draw.name: Sorteo del tirador
action->Shootist's Draw.description:
Frecuencia una vez por ronda

Efecto Quara Interactúa para sacar una ballesta de mano de repetición cargada y golpea con ella, o Golpea con una ballesta de mano de repetición cargada que está sosteniendo y luego interactúa para guardarla.

action->Skirmishing Dash.name: Carrera de escaramuza
action->Skirmishing Dash.description: Quara Zancadas o Pasos, luego Golpea. Este golpe inflige 3d6 de daño adicional.

action->Stupor Poison.name: Veneno de estupor
action->Stupor Poison.description:
El veneno de estupor es una destilación más potente de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison}. Una mayor exposición al veneno de estupor no requiere que el objetivo intente tiradas de salvación adicionales; Sólo fallar una tirada de salvación contra una exposición en curso puede avanzar en su etapa.

Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:alchemical,incapacitation,injury,poison,sleep]

Duración máxima 6 horas

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} y ​​con la guardia baja (1 asalto)

Etapa 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} sin control de Percepción para despertar (1 ronda)

Etapa 4 inconsciente sin control de Percepción para despertar ( [[/r 1d6 #hours]]{1d6 hours} )

Reaper Skull Puffball.name: Puffball del cráneo de la Parca
Reaper Skull Puffball.publicNotes:
Muchos hongos bejines benignos se aferran a los detritos del suelo del bosque en las cavernas de las Tierras Oscuras. Las versiones gigantes de estos hongos son más móviles y peligrosas.

Cuando este hongo detecta una presa, sus zarcillos se retuercen y exudan una toxina paralizante.

action->Motion Sense 60 feet.name: Sensor de movimiento 60 pies
action->Motion Sense 60 feet.description: El monstruo siente el movimiento a través de vibraciones y movimiento del aire.

action->Spore Explosion.name: Explosión de esporas
action->Spore Explosion.description:
Cuando la bola de cráneo del segador muere, explota, causando @Damage[8d8[poison]] daño a cada criatura en una @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] ( @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] salvación).

Las criaturas que fallan en su salvación están expuestas a la pudrición del cráneo.

action->Paralysis.name: Parálisis
action->Paralysis.description: Una criatura golpeada por el zarcillo del puffball debe superar una salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] o convertirse en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralizado} . La criatura paralizada puede intentar una nueva salvación al final de cada uno de sus turnos.

action->Skull Rot.name: Podredumbre del cráneo
action->Skull Rot.description:
Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

Duración máxima 6 rondas

Etapa 1 @Damage[1d8[poison]] daño más @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 2} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 @Damage[2d8[poison]] daño más debilitado 2 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 1} (1 asalto)

Etapa 3 @Damage[3d8[poison]] daño más debilitado 2 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado 2} ( [[/br 1d4 #Duration Skull Rot]]{1d4 rounds} )

action->Spore Cloud.name: Nube de esporas
action->Spore Cloud.description:
El pedo de lobo libera un @Template[type:cone|distance:30] de esporas que causa @Damage[4d8[poison]] daño ( @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] salvación) a las criaturas en el cono.

Las criaturas que fallan esta salvación también están expuestas a la pudrición del cráneo.

Rusty Grate Pit.name: Pozo de rejilla oxidada
Rusty Grate Pit.description: La rejilla oxidada cubre un hoyo que tiene 10 pies de diámetro y 40 pies de profundidad.
Rusty Grate Pit.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Harmlessly Trigger Trap] para activar la trampa de manera inofensiva empujando la puerta o el cabrestante colgante, o @Check[type:thievery|dc:24|name:Stabilize Grate] para estabilizar la rejilla para que no colapse.
Rusty Grate Pit.stealth: (experto), o 0 si la rejilla está abierta

action->Pitfall.name: Trampa
action->Pitfall.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura camina hacia la rejilla

Efecto La criatura desencadenante cae y sufre daño por caída ( @Damage[20[bludgeoning]] daño). Esa criatura puede usar la reacción @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} para evitar caer.

Ya sea que la criatura agarre un borde o no, el cabrestante oxidado de arriba se estrella sobre la criatura desencadenante, causando @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]] daño y desalojando suagarre ( @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] guardar). La criatura aún puede intentar agarrar una ventaja nuevamente.

spell->Deafness.name: Deafness
spell->Deafness.description:
The target loses hearing; it must attempt a Fortitude save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Failure The target is Deafened for 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The target is Deafened permanently.

spell->Shatter.name: Shatter
spell->Shatter.description:
A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2d10 sonic damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it is 4 or lower.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10, and the Hardness the spell ignores increases by 2.

spell->Charm.name: Charm
spell->Charm.description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Command.name: Command
spell->Command.description:
You shout a command that's hard to ignore. You can command the target to approach you, run away (as if it had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition), release what it's holding, drop @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or stand in place. It can't Delay or take any reactions until it has obeyed your command. The effects depend on the target's Will save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure For the first action on its next turn, the creature must use a single action to do as you command.

Critical Failure The target must use all its actions on its next turn to obey your command.

Heightened (5th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

spell->Dancing Lights.name: Luces danzantes
spell->Dancing Lights.description: Creas hasta cuatro luces flotantes, ninguna de las cuales está a más de 10 pies de distancia. Cada uno arroja luz como una antorcha. Cuando sostienes el hechizo, puedes mover cualquier cantidad de luces hasta 60 pies. Cada luz debe permanecer a 120 pies de usted y a 10 pies de todas las demás, o parpadeará.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
spell->Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

spell->Shield.name: Shield
spell->Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Effect: Shield Immunity}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

spell->Soothe.name: Soothe
spell->Soothe.description:
You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Spell Effect: Soothe}

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.

spell->Soothe.name: Soothe
spell->Soothe.description:
You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Spell Effect: Soothe}

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.

spell->Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
spell->Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
spell->Ventriloquism.description:
Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

armor->Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
armor->Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

action->Dance Moves.name: Movimientos de baile
action->Dance Moves.description:
Desencadenante Ryta es objetivo de un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia por parte de un atacante que puede ver.

Efecto Ryta Da un paso y gana una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a la CA contra el ataque desencadenante.

action->Cheek Pouches.name: Bolsas para las mejillas
action->Cheek Pouches.description: Ryta tiene bolsas elásticas en las mejillas que pueden almacenar hasta 1 pie cúbico de objetos (aunque no más de cuatro artículos livianos). Puede eliminar o almacenar un elemento mediante la acción Interactuar. Mientras tenga al menos un objeto en las bolsas de sus mejillas, su habla es notablemente difícil de entender.

action->Swarming.name: enjambre
action->Swarming.description: Ryta puede finalizar su movimiento en la misma casilla que un aliado que también tenga esta habilidad. Sólo dos de esas criaturas pueden compartir el mismo espacio.

action->Vocal Warm-Up.name: Calentamiento vocal
action->Vocal Warm-Up.description:
Ryta genera vibraciones devastadoras que resuenan en su garganta y en las bolsas de sus mejillas. Hasta el comienzo de su siguiente turno, sus golpes con colmillos causan un @Damage[2d8[sonic]] daño adicional.

Ryta no puede usar el calentamiento vocal si tiene un objeto en las bolsas de las mejillas.

spell->Divine Wrath.name: Divine Wrath
spell->Divine Wrath.description:
You channel the fury of divinity against your foes. You deal 4d10 spirit damage to enemies in the area, depending on their Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}; while it's sickened, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

spell->Read Omens.name: Read Omens
spell->Read Omens.description: You peek into the future. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You learn a cryptic clue or piece of advice that could help with the chosen event, often in the form of a rhyme or omen.

spell->Blindness.name: Blindness
spell->Blindness.description:
You blind the target. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} until its next turn begins.

Failure The target is Blinded for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is Blinded permanently.

spell->Chilling Darkness.name: Chilling Darkness
spell->Chilling Darkness.description:
You shoot an utterly cold ray of darkness tinged with unholy energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. You deal 5d6 cold damage, plus 5d6 spirit damage if the target is a celestial.

If the ray passes through an area of magical light or targets a creature affected by magical light, chilling darkness attempts to counteract the light. If you need to determine whether the ray passes through an area of light, draw a line between yourself and the spell's target.

Critical Success The target takes double damage.

Success The target takes full damage.

Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 2d6, and the spirit damage against celestials increases by 2d6.

spell->Crisis of Faith.name: Crisis of Faith
spell->Crisis of Faith.description:
You assault the target's faith, riddling the creature with doubt and mental turmoil that deal 6d6 mental damage, or 6d8 mental damage if it can cast divine spells. The effects are determined by its Will save.

To many deities, casting this spell on a follower of your own deity without significant cause is anathema.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage; if the target can cast divine spells, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round, and can't cast divine spells for 1 round.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6 (or by 2d8 if the target is a divine spellcaster).

spell->Augury.name: Augury
spell->Augury.description:
You gain a vague glimpse of the future. During the casting of this spell, ask about the results of a particular course of action. The spell can predict results up to 30 minutes into the future and reveals the GM's best guess among the following outcomes:

  • Weal The results will be good.
  • Woe The results will be bad.
  • Weal and Woe The results will be a mix of good and bad.
  • Nothing There won't be particularly good or bad results.

The GM rolls a secret @Check[flat|dc:6|traits:secret]. On a failure, the result is always "nothing." This makes it impossible to tell whether a "nothing" result is accurate. If anyone asks about the same topic as the first casting of augury during an additional casting, the GM uses the secret roll result from the first casting. If circumstances change, though, it's possible to get a different result.

spell->Darkness.name: Darkness
spell->Darkness.description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

spell->Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
spell->Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
spell->Dispel Magic.target: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item

spell->See Invisibility.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]
Ver Invisibilidad
spell->See Invisibility.description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{Spell Effect: See the Unseen}

spell->Bane.name: Bane
spell->Bane.description:
You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt.

Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area.

Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bane, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw.

Bane can counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UTLp7omqsiC36bso]{Spell Effect: Bane}

spell->Chill Touch.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]
Toque frío
spell->Chill Touch.description:
Siphoning void energy into yourself, your hand radiates a pale darkness. Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead.

  • Living Creature The spell deals void damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round on a critical failure.
  • Undead Creature The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

Heightened (+1) The void damage to living creatures increases by 1d4.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Divine Lance.name: Divine Lance
spell->Divine Lance.description:
You unleash a beam of divine energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 spirit damage (double damage on a critical hit).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

spell->Fear.name: Fear
spell->Fear.description:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to five creatures.

spell->Grim Tendrils.name: Grim Tendrils
spell->Grim Tendrils.description:
Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]] damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage.

Heightened (+1) The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

spell->Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
spell->Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]
Rayo de debilitamiento
spell->Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
A ray that saps a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save to determine the spell's effect. If your attack roll is a critical success, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.

spell->Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
spell->Sanctuary.description:
You ward a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

spell->Sigil.name: Sigil
spell->Sigil.description:
You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your heightened level.

Heightened (3rd) The sigil instead fades after 1 month.

Heightened (5th) The sigil instead fades after 1 year.

Heightened (7th) The sigil never fades.

action->Glow.name: Brillo
action->Glow.description: 20 pies. Sacuishu es naturalmente @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} pero brilla con una enfermiza luz verde, proyectando una luz brillante en el aura y haciéndola visible.

action->Magic Immunity.name: Inmunidad mágica
action->Magic Immunity.description: Sacuishu es inmune a todos los hechizos excepto @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Revealing Light}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Quandary}.

action->Feed on Magic.name: Alimentarse de magia
action->Feed on Magic.description:
Requisito Una criatura que puede lanzar hechizos está a 15 pies de Sacuishu

Efecto Sacuishu se alimenta de la magia de la criatura. Sacuishu recupera [[/r 2d8[healing]]] puntos de vida y el objetivo debe intentar una salvación @Check[type:will|dc:28]. Luego, el objetivo queda temporalmente inmune durante 1 hora.

Éxito crítico El objetivo no se ve afectado.

Éxito La primera vez que el objetivo lanza un hechizo antes del inicio del siguiente turno del Sacuishu, el hechizo se interrumpe a menos que el objetivo tenga éxito en una prueba @Check[type:flat|dc:15].

Fracaso Como éxito, pero el efecto se aplica la primera vez que el objetivo lanza un hechizo dentro del siguiente minuto.

Fallo crítico Como éxito, pero el efecto se aplica cada vez que elEl objetivo lanza un hechizo en el siguiente minuto. Además, Sacuishu duplica los puntos de vida que recupera

action->Go Dark.name: Ir a la oscuridad
action->Go Dark.description: Sacuishu apaga su brillo, convirtiéndose en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} . Puede finalizar este efecto con otro uso de esta acción. Si usa su ataque de choque mientras es invisible, el arco de electricidad permite a cualquier observador determinar su ubicación, lo que hace que Sacuishu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} para los observadores sólo hasta que se mueva.

Salaisa Malthulas.name: Salaisa Malthulas
Salaisa Malthulas.saveDetails: +1 estado a todas las salvaciones versus magia, +2 estado a todas las salvaciones versus mentales

spell->Darkness (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]
Oscuridad (a voluntad)
spell->Darkness (At Will).description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.

spell->Faerie Fire (At Will).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]
Fuego de hadas (a voluntad)
spell->Faerie Fire (At Will).description: All creatures in the area when you cast the spell are limned in colorful, heatless fire of a color of your choice for the duration. Visible creatures can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by faerie fire. If the creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, they are Concealed while affected by faerie fire, rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

spell->Dancing Lights.name: Luces danzantes
spell->Dancing Lights.description: Creas hasta cuatro luces flotantes, ninguna de las cuales está a más de 10 pies de distancia. Cada uno arroja luz como una antorcha. Cuando sostienes el hechizo, puedes mover cualquier cantidad de luces hasta 60 pies. Cada luz debe permanecer a 120 pies de usted y a 10 pies de todas las demás, o parpadeará.

weapon->Hand Crossbow.name: Hand Crossbow
weapon->Hand Crossbow.description: Sometimes referred to as an alley bow by rogues or ruffians, this small crossbow fires small bolts that are sometimes used to deliver poison to the target. It's small enough to be shot one-handed, but it still requires two hands to load.

weapon->+1 Striking Corrosive Longsword.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]
+1 Espada larga corrosiva impactante
weapon->+1 Striking Corrosive Longsword.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]

Las espadas largas pueden ser espadas de uno o dos filos. Sus hojas son pesadas y miden entre 3 y 4 pies de largo.

armor->Breastplate.name: Breastplate
armor->Breastplate.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.r0ifJfoz8aqf0mwk]

Aunque se la conoce como coraza, este tipo de armadura consta de varias piezas de armadura de placa o media placa que protegen el torso, el pecho, el cuello y, a veces, las caderas y la parte inferior de las piernas. Otorga estratégicamente parte de la protección de la placa al tiempo que permite una mayor flexibilidad y velocidad.

consumable->Bolts.name: Bolts
consumable->Bolts.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

consumable->Stupor Poison.name: Stupor Poison
consumable->Stupor Poison.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.nn2HAN1XKkKHfVnM]

El veneno de estupor es una destilación más potente de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison}. Una mayor exposición al veneno de estupor no requiere que el objetivo intente tiradas de salvación adicionales; Sólo fallar una tirada de salvación contra una exposición en curso puede avanzar en su etapa.

Etapa 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} sin control de Percepción para despertar (1ronda)

action->Attack Now!.name: ¡Ataca ahora!
action->Attack Now!.description: Salaisa grita, y un aliado drow dentro de 30 pies que puede ver u oír a Salaisa realiza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia como reacción.

action->Storm of Blades.name: Tormenta de espadas
action->Storm of Blades.description: Salaisa alcanza su velocidad. Puede realizar hasta tres golpes con espada larga en cualquier momento durante este movimiento, cada uno contra un objetivo diferente a su alcance. Estos ataques cuentan para su penalización de ataques múltiples, pero la penalización de ataques múltiples no aumenta hasta que ella realiza todos sus ataques. Si se mueve a la mitad de su velocidad o menos durante , ese movimiento no desencadena reacciones.

action->Stupor Poison.description:
El veneno de estupor es una destilación más potente de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison}. Una mayor exposición al veneno de estupor no requiere que el objetivo intente tiradas de salvación adicionales; Sólo fallar una tirada de salvación contra una exposición en curso puede avanzar en su etapa.

Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:alchemical,incapacitation,injury,poison,sleep]

Duración máxima 6 horas

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} y ​​con la guardia baja (1 asalto)

Etapa 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente} sin control de Percepción para despertar (1 ronda)

Etapa 4 inconsciente sin control de Percepción para despertar ( [[/r 1d6 #hours]]{1d6 hours} )

Scalathrax.name: escalatrax
Scalathrax.publicNotes:
Estos horrores resbaladizos y escamosos habitan en redes de cuevas remotas en las Tierras Oscuras y prefieren anidar en fisuras estrechas. Cuando están de caza, lanzan púas de sus largas patas o rocían a sus enemigos con un aceite transparente y tóxico. El mismo aceite cubre el cuerpo del scalathrax, todo lo cual es bastante inflamable, ya sea que cubra a una víctima o al scalathrax mismo.

Si bien un scalathrax parece salvaje, es más inteligente de lo que parece y es capaz de hablar en un ambiente húmedo yvoz resbaladiza. La gran mayoría de los scalathraxes tienen mal genio y se enojan rápidamente, y la mayoría disfruta matando. Es posible forjar una alianza con un scalathrax, pero hacerlo requiere sobornos constantes de nuevas criaturas para matar o una personalidad particularmente intimidante: los scalathrax a menudo respetan a los matones, viendo en ellos un espejo de sus propios valores crueles.

action->Oily Scales.name: Escamas aceitosas
action->Oily Scales.description:
Un scalatrax suda constantemente un aceite brillante que lo hace excepcionalmente resbaladizo. Trata los resultados de las pruebas de Acrobacias hasta @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} o de cualquier prueba de habilidad hasta @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} como un grado de éxito mayor que el resultado obtenido.

Un scalathrax pierde este beneficio durante 1 minuto después de recibir cualquier cantidad de daño por fuego.

action->Scalathrax Venom.name: Veneno de Scalathrax
action->Scalathrax Venom.description:
Tiro de salvación @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

Duración máxima 6 rondas

Etapa 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} (1 ronda)

Etapa 2 torpe 1 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 1} (1 ronda)

Etapa 3 torpe 1 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Lentificado 2} (1 ronda)

action->Spray Toxic Oil.name: Rocíe aceite tóxico
action->Spray Toxic Oil.description:
El scalathrax expulsa una gota de aceite tóxico de su boca en un @Template[type:cone|distance:15] . Las criaturas en el área deben intentar una salvación @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect].

El scalathrax no puede volver a usar el spray de aceite tóxico durante [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Spray Toxic Oil]]{1d4 rounds}.

Éxito crítico La criatura no se ve afectada.

Éxito La criatura sufre @Damage[1d8[poison]] de daño.

Fallo La criatura sufre @Damage[2d8[poison]] daño. Durante 1 minuto, la criatura gana debilidad para disparar 5, y cada vez que la criatura falla críticamente en una tirada de ataque con un arma empuñada, deja caer el arma.

Fallo crítico Como fallo, pero @Damage[4d8[poison]] daño.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.75B7z49jfQbWcSy9]{Effect: Spray Toxic Oil}

Seugathi Guard.name: Guardia Seugathi
Seugathi Guard.publicNotes:
Los seugathi más comunes generados por neotélidos son los sirvientes seugathi. Sus amos los equipan con herramientas útiles en sus tareas (a menudo una varita y un arma), y rara vez valoran otras cosas materiales más allá de su utilidad para completar la misión impresa.

Los malvados alienígenas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.wxBQsGLdti2xcGVT]{Neothelids} se impregnan a través de magia ritual para producir criaturas servidores parecidas a gusanos llamadas seugathis. Estas criaturas se generan con unfuerte impulso psíquico para completar alguna tarea en nombre de los planes de largo alcance de los neotélidos. Estas directivas son diversas, extrañas y generalmente crueles con la vida humanoide.
Seugathi Guard.saveDetails: +1 estado a todas las salvaciones vs. magia

spell->Hypercognition.name: Hypercognition
spell->Hypercognition.description: You rapidly catalog and collate information relevant to your current situation. You can instantly use up to 6 Recall Knowledge actions as part of Casting this Spell. For these actions, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge.

spell->Levitate.name: Levitate
spell->Levitate.description:
You defy gravity and levitate the target 5 feet off the ground. You can Sustain the spell to move the target up or down 10 feet. A creature floating in the air from levitate takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. A floating creature can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn. If the target is adjacent to a fixed object or terrain of suitable stability, it can move across the surface by climbing (if the surface is vertical, like a wall) or crawling (if the surface is horizontal, such as a ceiling). The GM determines which surfaces can be climbed or crawled across.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{Spell Effect: Levitate}

spell->Mind Reading.name: Mind Reading
spell->Mind Reading.description:
With a cursory mental touch, you attempt to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target perceives vague surface thoughts from you when you Cast the Spell.

Success You find out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Failure You perceive vague surface thoughts from the target when you Cast the Spell, and you find out whether its Intelligence is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Critical Failure As failure, and for the duration of the spell, you can Sustain the spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.

spell->Daze.name: Daze
spell->Daze.description:
You push into the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals 1d6 mental damage, with a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

spell->Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
spell->Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies. You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower rank than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bikFUFRLwfdvX2x2]{Invisibility Potion}) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the rank or level of the most powerful magical effect the spell detects, as determined by the GM.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd rank, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-rank magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

spell->Telekinetic Hand.name: Telekinetic Hand
spell->Telekinetic Hand.description:
You create a floating, magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and levitates it slowly up to 20 feet in any direction. When you Sustain the spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.
spell->Telekinetic Hand.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

spell->Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
spell->Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal 2d6 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object you hurled. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

weapon->Longsword.name: Longsword
weapon->Longsword.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]

Las espadas largas pueden ser espadas de uno o dos filos. Sus hojas son pesadas y miden entre 3 y 4 pies de largo.

consumable->Wand of See Invisibility (Le.consumableSpellDescription:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.
consumable->Wand of See Invisibility (Le.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vJZ49cgi8szuQXAD]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}

Este bastón mide aproximadamente un pie de largo y contiene un solo hechizo. La apariencia normalmente se relaciona con el hechizo interior.

Activar Lanzar un hechizo

Frecuencia una vez al día, más recargo

Efecto Lanzas el Hechizo al nivel indicado.

Requisitos de artesanía Proporcionar un lanzamiento del hechizo del nivel indicado.

Nota: Para crear un pergamino o varita de un hechizo específico, arrastre el hechizo desde el compendio o navegador de compendio al inventario de un PC, NPC o actor de botín.

La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]

action->Telepathy 100 feet.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]
